name: 航海日記：起航(Uncharted Ocean: Set Sail)
name_original: 航海日記：起航(Uncharted Ocean: Set Sail)
description:
Uncharted Ocean, a simulation sailing game is now released! It is set in the Age of Discovery, in the time when European Fleets have been expanding their trading areas by exploring uncharted oceans and waters to find new routes and partners. Players can choose among 8 nationalities, each nationality has its unique skills, friend and enemy countries. It's time for you to begin a great navigation era!

The journeys are also ocean adventures. Navigation is like life. The things players may meet in the adventures are uncharted. Your adventure is full of challenges and never a smooth ride. In the process of conquering the uncharted oceans and waters, players could meet a variety of disasters caused by the uncertain weather or some unexpected incidents. So preparing enough materials before exploring uncharted oceans and waters is necessary.

The Age of Discovery is also the Era of Pirates. Players can choose to be a pirate. If players choose other nationalities, they may encounter pirates who will plunder treasure. To defend against the pirates, protect the treasure from plundering and explore the uncharted oceans, players should recruit rich crews and build battle ships armed with super equipments and to win an ocean attack. How to recruit rich crew and build your battle ship fleet is up to you.

Having enough golden coins is the foundation of sailing, recruiting rich crews and building equipments and battle ships. So how can players make money? The answer is trading and plundering. Buying and selling goods is a good way for players to become a millionaire. When having enough money, players can make investment to activate port buffs.

Do you want to rule a town? If the answer is yes, we suggest players investing in the towns. Players can be the mayor of the town.

To get the materials of building battle ships, except for buying and plundering, players may pick up some props on the oceans when exploring the uncharted oceans and waters.

There is also extra fun of exploring uncharted oceans- the Black Market and Archaeology. The Black Market provides some useful props. Archaeology helps players find historic props before the Age of Discovery.

Features:

Trading - Players may meet nearly a hundred of ports when exploring the uncharted oceans and waters. Each port has its different specialty goods.

Engage in naval battles - Have a casual chat with other voyagers in the battle ships on the ocean, or plunder treasure from them! If they are too powerful to be defeated... just run!

Building battle ships - Start your mighty battle ship fleet by building and customizing hulls --- adding cannons and figureheads!

Investment - Investing in ports to activate port buffs. If you invest most in the town which belongs to your nation, you can even be the mayor to rule the town!

Rich crews - Plenty of crew arrange systems for you to boost navigating.

Weather system - Battle ship sailing speed is influenced by the wind speed and power. Players can't see too much far through fogs, while storms always bring damage to your battle ships. No one dares cross the formidable Cape of Storms without battle ships strong enough.

Sailing status - Exploring the uncharted oceans and waters is an adventure. Players must be able to handle every kind of emergencies in time.

Extra items - Players can use extra items to fish, collect drinkable water and recover treasures in the bottom of the ocean.

Duels mode - Duels mode can be activated by certain plots, rebels of crews and even when you recruit a new crew... so let's play solo!

Exploring the uncharted oceans - Players can explore sites outside cities or ruins along coasts. Except common materials, you may also gain hundreds of rare collections by exploring, plundering and in other ways.

Black Market- The Black marketer is the man who holds the top grade goods in hand but does not appear commonly. Finding them depends on your luck.

Let's begin the uncharted navigation!
